ipaddress 0.1.2.9000

  • Changelog

Sample random addresses

Source: R/sample.R
sample_ip.Rd

Generates random IPv4 or IPv6 addresses.

sample_ipv4(size, replace = FALSE)

sample_ipv6(size, replace = FALSE)

Arguments

size

Integer specifying the number of addresses to return
replace

Should sampling be with replacement?

Value

An ip_address vector

See also

Use sample_network() to sample addresses from a specific IP network.

Examples

sample_ipv4(5)
#> <ip_address[5]>
#> [1] 172.101.229.23  150.110.200.78  203.46.196.76   62.158.4.129   
#> [5] 228.195.254.189

sample_ipv6(5)
#> <ip_address[5]>
#> [1] 64e2:fe00:7b2:55f6:1b2c:101a:8682:c0a7 
#> [2] abe8:4935:80b1:357b:55b5:f37c:431f:f2b5
#> [3] dc35:5f71:eff6:9205:6d00:4685:2ad0:6660
#> [4] a1fa:8452:1ba9:8b8:b440:662c:c329:40ab 
#> [5] 4516:51ed:4292:6109:960c:a78c:11bb:3593
